briefdescription.para: Return true if no connections with active measurements.
Setup to send measurements on active connections.
Find next connection with measurement to send.

parameterdescription.para: Heart rate measurement CCC descriptor index.

briefdescription.para: Build a heart rate measurement characteristic.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to buffer to hold the built heart rate measurement characteristic.

briefdescription.para: Handle a received ATT handle value confirm.
This function is called by the application when the periodic measurement timer expires.
Initialize the Heart Rate profile sensor.

parameterdescription.para: WSF handler ID of the application using this service.

briefdescription.para: Start periodic heart rate measurement. This function starts a timer to perform periodic measurements.

parameterdescription.para: WSF event designated by the application for the timer.
Index of heart rate CCC descriptor in CCC descriptor handle table.

memberdef.argsstring: (dmConnId_t connId, uint16_t handle, uint8_t operation, uint16_t offset, uint16_t len, uint8_t *pValue, attsAttr_t *pAttr)
memberdef.name: HrpsWriteCback

briefdescription.para: ATTS write callback for heart rate service. Use this function as a parameter to SvcHrsCbackRegister().
